mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing images and elements for faster load times on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Implement lazy loading for images and scripts to reduce page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve internal linking structure to boost search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Enhance accessibility features like contrast and font size for better readability.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of required steps.
